title: I'm lagging with good ping and high fps
body: I have had some weird lags for 3 days now. I have good ping and high fps but when i play the game slows down then everything skips by very fast. It is very annoying and i do not know how to fix it. This is the first time it happened. If you know anything about it or can help it would be very much appreciated.

replies.body: Are you on Mac or PC?  It sounds like something might be having trouble rendering or maybe even an outdated driver causing this freeze.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot this.  I hope that helps!
